website_summaries.verdict: Keeps boat upholstery conditioned and supple with regular use.
pros: Holds up over time and protects boats that are exposed to the elements year round
Described as excellent and can help improve existing damage
Gentle ingredients work well with several types of interior fabrics
cons: Not known how this product works on stains

customer_reviews.title: I Seem to Always Run Out of This Stuff
customer_reviews.text: I love using this stuff and it works great. In fact, I am always running out. I may overdue it, but I enjoy using this product and the extra piece of mind of having a clean boat. I also use it regularly to try and help my vinyl seats from 1994 from drying out and cracking. So far so good. Tip for protecting your vinyl--spray this on and let it soak for a good 5-10 minutes before wiping it off. You want to let it soak into the vinyl but also into the threads to keep them protected. Please be sure to let me know if you found this review helpful.
customer_reviews.author: Bryce2113

customer_reviews.title: Did not clean boat seats
customer_reviews.text: Based off of the other reviews, I thought this would be the thing to clean my boat seats with. I looked all over town for this stuff and then finally ordered it off of Amazon. I followed the directions on the bottle and it did not work at all. I don't really understand how I had such different results than the others, but I did.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew Price

customer_reviews.title: This stuff has a wicked odor to it.......???
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this to condition my waterbed mattress. It seemed to do a good job but the odor left behind is completely horrible. How a basic silicone product smells this bad is beyond my knowledge of chemistry; must be something other than water-based solvent used. At the quantity, price, and Maguire's reputation with free shipping I thought I would get a better product than the BlueMagic product. Don't use this stuff indoors (should be a warning) but might be great for outdoor/marine vinyl furniture.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Brezenski

customer_reviews.title: BUY IT!
customer_reviews.text: I should've had my husband take a before and after of our boat. He said it worked on not only the upholstery but also the black plastic parts on the dash. A month after he wiped them down, they're still a majority of the way polished the way Armor All would be. Armor All just doesn't do it for this case on the boat, even though it spends 90% of the time covered. It's good to know, our black dash coverings were pretty thirsty so I see us adding a couple more coats of it back to back but were pretty impressed since this was a shot in the dark.
customer_reviews.author: cclipari

customer_reviews.title: Meguiar's got me this time - - -
customer_reviews.text: Have always trusted and used Meguiar's products for my car, so I thought I'd try their advertised product for the vinyl and the seat coverings on my boat. Makes black look shiny like ArmorAll, but that's as far as it goes. No cleaning. Same thing with all the boat seats - no cleaning to speak of and does not spice up the color. Basically it's a no buy again, and I'll look for another brand name that gives me the actual results that are advertised.
customer_reviews.author: Carl

customer_reviews.title: Works great on my boat seats and jetski seats
customer_reviews.text: Works great on my boat seats and jetski seats. It's the only thing I've found that will clean the little black dots (spider poop) off of the seats. My local marine dealer suggested it. Now it's all I buy. I threw all all the other cleaning chemicals I tried before this.
customer_reviews.author: Susan C.

customer_reviews.title: This is absolutely the best rubber/vinyl cleaner out there
customer_reviews.text: This is absolutely the best rubber/vinyl cleaner out there! Hands down. I have been using this product for 3+ years. You can use it to clean your car tires (and you wont need tire dressing - this stuff makes them nice and matte black). It won’t make your tires shiny or greasy. Just really black and clean. Like they were brand new. It also works great to clean the rubber on your tennis shoes. I use it to clean the scuffs on my Converse and Nikes.
customer_reviews.author: HouBnkr

customer_reviews.title: Gives rubber that “wet” look
customer_reviews.text: I bought used rubber 4’x6’ stall mats for our garage gym. I have scrubbed and washed the mats with soap and water twice, but it still left a white/chalky residue once it dried. I was aiming for the “wet rubber” look. This product did just that! It made the mats look almost brand new! It definitely transformed them and a little goes a long way. I probably only used 1/5 of the bottle for 16’x12’ area.
customer_reviews.author: M M

customer_reviews.title: Love this cleaner!
customer_reviews.text: I have bought this multiple times. Love it! I have a older pontoon boat that we use this on the seats. It cleans and provides protection for the vinyl. But, doesn't make the vinyl slippery. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Berkley Berkals

customer_reviews.title: Does not work as stated
customer_reviews.text: Had big expectations to clean jet ski seat and handle grips reviews for best cleaner. Results are wasted money,huge disappointment and black spots on the vynil seat and rubber grips unchanged .
customer_reviews.author: Assen Yanev

customer_reviews.title: Simply amazing.... saved me $600 for upholstery
customer_reviews.text: I was about to re-uphoster one of our dental chairs at the clinic because it appeared the vinyl were turning dark in areas near the feet. I tried scrubbing it with all kinds of cleaners and solvents before -- they did nothing. As a last resort, I got this thing, and the chair looks brand new in 20 minutes! WOW -- thank you Amazon reviewers for leading me to this product!
customer_reviews.author: E Kim

customer_reviews.title: Unbelievable results
customer_reviews.text: Used on my Triumph T120 slammer seat from British Customs. That seat looked fine before, but Meguiar’s made the marine grade vinyl look fantastic. Gave it a deep, rich shine that made it look almost like full-grain leather. I couldn’t believe it was the same seat. This and Meguire’s waterless wash have made me a brand loyalist. Great stuff.
customer_reviews.author: motodoc817

customer_reviews.title: Fights against new stains
customer_reviews.text: The product go's on easy enough, smalls like leather. Did not take off bug marks as well as I thought it would. BUT, I put the product on all my seats on a brand new Sylvan Pontoon Boat just before I pulled it all the way to Florida, ( 1450 miles ). The new bug stains came right off when I got there. So, it does well at repelling stains after applied!
customer_reviews.author: Steven

customer_reviews.title: Top rated vinyl protection- best in my opinion.
customer_reviews.text: Top rated vinyl protection- best I have ever used. Works well on leather robber and synthetics but is exceptional on vinyl fabric- particularly protect well from UV and water. Ideal for boats, fine for any other applications of vinyl. I use indoors on my $8k leather sectional and in my car interior.
customer_reviews.author: Joey D

customer_reviews.title: Not as good as hoped
customer_reviews.text: If you own a boat with white vinyl seats, they are always getting dirty. I found this product to work only so-so. I had great success from a product from a marine supply outlet but was tired of the price gouging, but I suppose I need to go back.
customer_reviews.author: JR

customer_reviews.title: Not up to standard
customer_reviews.text: I’ve had good luck with Meguiars wax products but this vinyl cleaner didn’t make a dent in cleaning my old boat vinyl. It may protect but don’t get for deep clean.
customer_reviews.author: Mark J. Burriss

customer_reviews.title: Works grwat
customer_reviews.text: This worked great and was easy to use on our boat vinyl. It seems to be keeping the vinyl clean and fresh. It doesn't have a harsh smell and recommends wearing a glove but I didn't and it didn't damage skin
customer_reviews.author: Salisagpb

customer_reviews.title: For a deep cleaning try something else. No good.
customer_reviews.text: Attempted to use this to clean my vinyl boat seats after a season of neglect. Product had almost no cleaning effect. It may work for protecting against the sun but it does not work to clean a boat that needs a serious deep cleaning. Probably works for maintenance but not a full detail. Didn’t remove any mold or mildew stains, and left parts of the boat floor very slick. I do not recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: LFM

customer_reviews.title: Not happy with shipping method
customer_reviews.text: I have ordered this product in the past and it works wonderfully! When I first ordered it, it was packaged with a cap on the bottle and the spray nozzle separate, this last order I placed came with the spray nozzle attached to the bottle and a substantial amount had leaked out of the bottle and was inside the package. Was not happy with the shipping method this last time.
customer_reviews.author: Joann Corathers

customer_reviews.title: Buy Meguiars!
customer_reviews.text: While the rubber and vinyl product is excellent, Meguiar's customer service is incredible. Although Amazon made the mistake and shipped me a broken bottle. Liquid everywhere, Meguiars stood by their customer (me) and took care of sending me a new one. Hats off to Meguiars for good products and awesome support!
customer_reviews.author: jb

customer_reviews.title: This stuff smells horrible
customer_reviews.text: I put this on my grill cover. It’s been a week now and I can smell it 15 feet away! Smells like stink bugs! I got it on my hands when using it and my hands stunk for three days!
customer_reviews.author: Slacker554

customer_reviews.title: Great for boat seats
customer_reviews.text: Great for boat seats. Use a little after each extended use
customer_reviews.author: Josh

customer_reviews.title: Motorcycle Seat
customer_reviews.text: I used this on my vinyl motorcycle seats and it works amazing. It is normally stored however driving to work or on trips it is out in the sun. This stuff brings the life back in the seat and makes it stay nice looking. The smell is overwhelming but it disappears after a day or so.
customer_reviews.author: Greg Chatfield II

customer_reviews.title: Cleans and conditions boat seats
customer_reviews.text: Used this with clean rag, then magic eraser, then clean rag again and it made grimy old vinyl boat upholstery look so much better. Did not make it look new, but the seats are 13 years old, so can't expect a miracle! But way better on the pocketbook than reupholstering!
customer_reviews.author: Liz MB

customer_reviews.title: Excellent results
customer_reviews.text: I used this to clean boat cushions after being stored for winter. Without much effort and using a microfiber mitt from the dollar store, the seats cleaned up easily. Pleased with purchase and will buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Denise

customer_reviews.title: works great
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to polish the dash and inside doors of my car. I tried many products, but nothing gave it a shine. This product will make the dashboard look new
customer_reviews.author: Ms. S. H. Cecere

customer_reviews.title: Like a miracle!
customer_reviews.text: My tires looked so dry after years of parking outside, but one quick squirt with no rubbing or wiping made them look like new, and now a month later they still look good. I especially like the idea of UV protection, since I've heard that's the hardest thing on tires. I wish I had done this sooner.
customer_reviews.author: J. Tiedman

customer_reviews.title: This is the best vinyl cleaner
customer_reviews.text: This is the best vinyl cleaner... I'v been using it for 20 years on the vinyl in our boat. It has protected and cleaned it well. It's hard to find so was so glad to find it on Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: suehaberly

customer_reviews.title: works as intended, perfectly usable. third time buying, only thing i will use on my boat dash.
customer_reviews.text: works as intended, perfectly usable. third time buying, only thing i will use on my boat dash. removed oxidation from black dash on boat.
customer_reviews.author: M2

customer_reviews.title: Good, but sprayer leaks badly
customer_reviews.text: It works great but I gave only four stars because the spray head leaks badly when trying to spray. I ended up with it all over my hands. It smells like Armor All.
customer_reviews.author: Paul

customer_reviews.title: This stuff really works.
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is awesome brought my hottub cover back to better that new it also shined my tires up great. I highly recommend this product and will be buying it again.
customer_reviews.author: kaydo

customer_reviews.title: Boat conditioner
customer_reviews.text: We love this conditioner that we use on our pontoon boat keeps leather nice and soft and clean dirt off as well. Fast delivery
customer_reviews.author: Mazzei281

customer_reviews.title: Looks like new
customer_reviews.text: We purchased a 32 yr old pontoon boat that needs some love. Someone told us to try this product. It makes the seating almost look like new. We are very impressed with it. I would buy again
customer_reviews.author: Lynn

customer_reviews.title: Good job getting rid of yellowing stains on old RV hard plastic
customer_reviews.text: This product did a good job getting rid of yellowing on old RV hard plastic. I did one pass with this cleaner, and then another pass with a magic eraser. The end result looks pretty good, but not perfect.
customer_reviews.author: William Underwood

customer_reviews.title: The best
customer_reviews.text: This is the only cleaner conditioner you'll ever need for your boat. never use Armor All again !
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cleans and protects
customer_reviews.text: Used it to clean and protect my boat seats. It works very good, I have tried many cleaners. I really like this one.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff

customer_reviews.title: Easy to Use
customer_reviews.text: Used this product on boat seats that are 10 years old. Worked wonders to clean seats up to the point they almost look like new. Very impressed with how well the seats turned out after use of product. Will continue to use product in the future.
customer_reviews.author: Tony

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I’ve used this product for years to clean my boat upholstery. Works great
customer_reviews.author: Miller-Mission

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product.
customer_reviews.text: I've used this for a few years on my pontoon seats and it works great.
customer_reviews.author: wolfric

customer_reviews.title: My go to
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this on my truck and wife car for years. I have tried other brands and none have lived up to this product. I have all leather in my truck and cleans and protects it great. This is also the best cleaner I have used behind kids growing up and also leaves your dash and trim looking new everytime.
customer_reviews.author: Joe

customer_reviews.title: Waste of money
customer_reviews.text: A waste of money. I bought it to clean my 2 month old golf cart seats but all I got was oily feeling seats. I already had Armoral so this was redundant. Save your money.
customer_reviews.author: art77554

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely the best rubber and vinyl conditioner I've ever used
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely the best rubber and vinyl conditioner I've ever used. Been using it on my Ranger Bass Boat for years and it really keeps it nice. Shiny but not slick and greasy feeling. Seems to have kept my seats bright and clean and my boats a 1996
customer_reviews.author: Myridge

customer_reviews.title: Better than Armorall
customer_reviews.text: Great product but expensive and doesn't cover a lot of area. Should be larger bottle and a few dollars less, does a better job than Armorall.
customer_reviews.author: Paul A. Mccloud

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: Does a great job cleaning up and conditioning old vinyl seats in boat.
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: MISSING PARTS
customer_reviews.text: WAs delivered without a sprayer. Just the bottle of solution. It appears that it might have been part of a multi pack.
customer_reviews.author: DAC

customer_reviews.title: Love this stuff
customer_reviews.text: I originally bought this for the rubber on my travel trailer ended up using it on my old jeep with faded plastic. Made it look like new again and lasted for several months.
customer_reviews.author: Dave

customer_reviews.title: Great every weekend cleaner for the pontoon
customer_reviews.text: Best marine cleaner conditioner for the price. I use 3m cream a few times a season, but routinely use this product every weekend. 16 yr old vinyl looks great. I just wish there was a better cleaner for the deep mold stains, nothing seems to work
customer_reviews.author: Brendan

customer_reviews.title: New old truck
customer_reviews.text: I purchased for my new Nitro boat and used it in my F-150 2004 truck that is always outside and the restoration of the dash and other trim in the interior is deep and rich.
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: smells nice, and has kept my vinyl seats from fading ...
customer_reviews.text: This is my go-to product for daily care and cleaning of my vinyl boat seats. The product cleans well, smells nice, and has kept my vinyl seats from fading after many years. I typically do a quick wipe down of the seats using the Meguiar's vinyl cleaner every time we put the boat up with a rag or a terry cloth towel. My boat is a 2007 and the seats are still in great condition. It does a great job of resisting stains and mildew and removing dirt and grime. I recommend always keeping a bottle of this stuff near your boat for daily use. It is a phenomenal product at a good price point.
customer_reviews.author: poison

customer_reviews.title: PERFECT!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this to ;dress' my jacuzzi cover & it works perfectly! Highly recommended!
customer_reviews.author: TampaBayOldie

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely works
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this on cushions etc. in my boat. I will continue to use it as I'm very satisfied with results.
customer_reviews.author: Ray

customer_reviews.title: Excellent shine and protection
customer_reviews.text: Smells good, cleans and makes vinyl shine. I put on and after many boat uses, I can still tell that the product is on the surface.
customer_reviews.author: Sean D.

customer_reviews.title: A very good conditioner but not so good as a cleaner
customer_reviews.text: A very good conditioner but not so good as a cleaner. I clean the seats first on my pontoon then apply Meguiar's and it leaves the seats looking fantastic. You'll need to buff with a dry cloth to remove some excess residue.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend for boat clean up!
customer_reviews.text: Awesome boat cleaner! We are very happy with quick and easy clean up. Grab a good rag and get to cleaning, you won’t be disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Justin Smith

customer_reviews.title: I bought these to use with Emax Design Makeup Brush ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought these to use with Emax Design Makeup Brush set. I have model airplanes that are coated in dust and these products are doing the job perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Morris

customer_reviews.title: This is the best vinyl protector out there
customer_reviews.text: This is the best vinyl protector out there. And it came fast and undamaged. I use this on my boat, my truck tonneau, my camper - anything that is exposed to the elements. I have even used it on my Rhino-liner! Great stuff!
customer_reviews.author: April

customer_reviews.title: Forget Armorall
customer_reviews.text: Meguiars is the best, I use it on the interior of the car, Boat cushions, even shoes, it lasts forever!
customer_reviews.author: will

customer_reviews.title: Best Vinyl Cleaner Ever
customer_reviews.text: I have used this cleaner for several seasons and love the way it makes marks and dirty spots disappear. I was concerned that because of the speed and performance of the cleaner that it may eventually ruin my seats but it has caused no damage to them since I have started using this product. I definitely recommend using this to clean any vinyl seat especially boats.
customer_reviews.author: Steve 363

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Cleans good, leaves a nice sheen. Did not remove some marks/stains I was hoping it would.
customer_reviews.author: Greg R

customer_reviews.title: restoring it to a beautiful white. Thank
customer_reviews.text: The interior of our boat had not been cleaned up for decades. This product did a superb job of cleaning up the vinyl, restoring it to a beautiful white. Thank you
customer_reviews.author: Don M. Greer

customer_reviews.title: Works great! Bought one for a friend who does auto ...
customer_reviews.text: I used Zymol for years, but could no longer find it. Thought I would try this. Works great ! Bought one for a friend who does auto detailing. He loves it as well.
customer_reviews.author: Ohio Yote

customer_reviews.title: Worked great on my 14 year old dash!
customer_reviews.text: Worked great on my 14 year old Toyota Sienna dash. It brought back all of the luster on the dash and other vinyl trim.
customer_reviews.author: WarrenJS

customer_reviews.title: Does what it claims.
customer_reviews.text: Puts a great protective coating on that you can see. Does just what the label says. I re apply every few weeks on my pontoon that's moored in a slip and always subjected to the elements.
customer_reviews.author: corey

customer_reviews.title: Fast shipping and great packaging, thanks for the excellent service
customer_reviews.text: Makes my seats on my seadoos feel and look great, thanks
customer_reviews.author: Gloria Mijares

customer_reviews.title: Box drank mine
customer_reviews.text: Planned on using this in my boat but the box drank most of it. Although the currier was nice enough to wrap it in a plastic bag. I’ll give it 3 stars and maybe more once I get another bottle
customer_reviews.author: Shrum

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: Easy and make it look great! Not a deep cleaner for stains
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works like a charm
customer_reviews.text: Omg this stuff is amazing. Follow the directions and it does exactly what it says. Took the yellow green slime right off the hull of our boat!
customer_reviews.author: Katie

customer_reviews.title: Had better luck with Mr
customer_reviews.text: Did not work at all. Used it to try and clean the edge of my pool. Had better luck with Mr. Clean pads. Going to be returning it.
customer_reviews.author: Luis A. Rios

customer_reviews.title: Works
customer_reviews.text: Does a wonderful job on my car interior and has a pleasant clean odor
customer_reviews.author: Gerald Bianco

customer_reviews.title: Makes your pontoon seats look great. Easy to use.
customer_reviews.text: Best cleaner for my pontoon seats. No slick surfaces. Looks great and protect your seats.

customer_reviews.title: Love this stuff
customer_reviews.text: We found reviews of this on line and love it. Repeat buyers every year. It cleans well and shines just enough but doesn’t make it slippery. Highly recommend.

customer_reviews.title: Really works well on reconditioning vynals & Leather
customer_reviews.text: Did good job on reconditioning our vynal hot tub top.

customer_reviews.title: UV protection and keep from staining
customer_reviews.text: It seems to clean the vinyl easy and keeps stuff from wanting to stick on it.

customer_reviews.title: Will keep buying
customer_reviews.text: This is a must have when cleaning boat seats. It's does the job and isn't greasy.
customer_reviews.author: bezgirl

customer_reviews.title: Can't go wrong with Meguiar's. It worked averagely as ...
customer_reviews.text: Can't go wrong with Meguiar's. It worked averagely as a cleaner, but now that I've used it few times on my boat cushions and bolsters, they feel conditioned and clean easier.
customer_reviews.author: Angela D

customer_reviews.title: Try it and see.
customer_reviews.text: Not bad, it did clean but not really to the level I expected. Could just be my expectations though. Try it for yourself, it’s not that expensive.
customer_reviews.author: Dale

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: Used it on my spa cover, works very well and lasts longer than the stuff that came with the spa.

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful finish
customer_reviews.text: This did a beautiful job on my hot tub and lid! It now looks great and like new.

customer_reviews.title: dont expect to much right away
customer_reviews.text: hard to tell its working even though i know it is

customer_reviews.text: Works great on my tonneau cover, makes it look brand new

customer_reviews.title: Excellent!
customer_reviews.text: Product is just as described and works well for cleaning with shine.

customer_reviews.title: Goes on easy, don't streak
customer_reviews.text: Just can't beat their products. I've used this for years on our boats and autos. Goes on easy, don't streak, leave interiors with that new car smell.

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: Works great for removing a little mildew residue and doesn't have the harsh chemicals like other cleaners. Haven't had it long enough to know how well it protects.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for the hot tub cover. I bought along with another similar item. Both work very well.

customer_reviews.text: It removed all of the yellow from the headlights on my Bettle automobile.

customer_reviews.text: This stuff is amazing, does not run off like other surface applied stuff and keeps everything looking great.

customer_reviews.title: Shining like a diamond
customer_reviews.text: Love it ... easy to use ... shining good ... a bit pricey but it works well so okay ...

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic Product
customer_reviews.text: Use this product on the vinyl/rubber in all vehicles and boat. Fantastic product!

customer_reviews.text: Will not remove white residue on black vinyl covered posts on my Honda Odyssey. OK for tires and interior.

customer_reviews.title: I hope you use your boat more than I do

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very good product for vinyl and rubber. We use it on our camper's vinyl cover.

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommended
customer_reviews.text: My application was an extreme case of car interior neglect. I had to clean some areas twice. In the end the dashboard and other interior vinyl looked almost brand new. It took very little elbow grease. Excellent product.
customer_reviews.author: Vicki D.

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very good on removing and restoring dull rubber and plastic.

customer_reviews.title: Great product for RV restoration.
customer_reviews.text: This product was purchased along with Meguiar's Marine & RV Fiberglass Restoration System. We could see a marked difference after using the restoration system and would recommend it for a great facelift to a 12 year old R.V.! Very happy with the results. We plan to use it on our recently purchased boat as well.

customer_reviews.title: Nice product
customer_reviews.text: We use this on seats on our pontoon boat. It cleans and provides some if protection.

customer_reviews.title: Would buy again. Great purchase.
customer_reviews.text: Used it to clean and protect my hot tub cover. Worked very well and made it look like new again. Great purchase.

customer_reviews.title: This stuff is awesome. Best vinyl protector I have ever used
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is awesome. Best vinyl protector I have ever used.
customer_reviews.author: Don W. Jordan

customer_reviews.title: Amazing boat cushion cleaner!
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is amazing! It took so much grime and gunk that I could never get off the vinyl cushions of our boat! It was especially good in the creases. I recommend using a soft toothbrush or small handbrush to be most effective. I wish I would have found this product years ago!
customer_reviews.author: Jena

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Pool was too far gone for it to work. So really not sure if product would of worked.
customer_reviews.author: Linda Stewart

customer_reviews.title: Works well but....
customer_reviews.text: This is a very good product and worked really well to clean the badly soiled vinyl cushion covers of my boat. However, there seems to be a slight residual stickiness that's been noticeable for a couple of weeks. Hopefully, it will resolve itself with time. We'll see.
customer_reviews.author: Maineman

product_meta.title: Meguiar's M5716SP Marine/RV Vinyl & Rubber Cleaner & Protectant, 16 oz
product_meta.description: Meguiar's M57 Marine/RV Vinyl & Rubber Cleaner & Protectant cleans, revitalizes and protects vinyl and rubber surfaces in one easy step. Its complex blend of premium ingredients gives color a rich natural sheen, not the typical artificial shine produced with conventional protectants. Conditioners and UV protection help prevent surfaces from drying, fading and cracking.
feature_bullets: PREMIUM INGREDIENTS: A complex blend of premium ingredients to clean, shine and protect vinyl, rubber and plastic surfaces
NATURAL SHEEN: Leaves vinyl, rubber and plastics with a clean, rich natural sheen instead of a greasy or artificial plastic look or feel
SURFACE PROTECTION: Conditioners help prevent boat and RV surfaces from drying, fading or cracking, while UV protection reduces damage caused by the sun
SPECIALLY FORMULATED: Formula geared toward the severe conditions of marine and RV environments
EASY TO USE: Convenient spray trigger allows you to easily spray on and wipe off
